description: a(n) = L(4n+1) where L() are the Lucas numbers.
references: V. E. Hoggatt, Jr., Fibonacci and Lucas Numbers, A Publication of the Fibonacci Association, Houghton Mifflin Co., 1969, pps. 27-29.
links: Index entries for linear recurrences with constant coefficients, signature (7,-1)
author: _Barry E. Williams_, Jul 11 2000
